original_text: He is to present the basket of unleavened bread and is to sacrifice the ram as a fellowship offering to the Lord, together with its grain offering and drink offering.
korean_text: 화목제물로 숫양에 무교병 한 광주리를 아울러 여호와께 드리고 그 소제와 전제를 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: He is to present the basket of unleavened bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 누룩 없는 빵 바구니를 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and is to sacrifice the ram
as a fellowship offering to the Lord
